description:
Provides a LaunchDarkly team member resource.

This resource allows you to create and manage team members within your LaunchDarkly organization.

-> **Note:** You can only manage team members with "admin" level personal access tokens. To learn more, read [Managing Teams](https://docs.launchdarkly.com/docs/teams).

tfcfnid.description: Internal identifier for tracking resource changes. Do not use.

CustomRoles.description: The list of custom roles keys associated with the team member. Custom roles are only available to customers on enterprise plans. To learn more about enterprise plans, contact sales@launchdarkly.com.

Email.description: The unique email address associated with the team member.

Role.description: The role associated with team member. Supported roles are `reader`, `writer`, or `admin`. If you don't specify a role, `reader` is assigned by default.
